General.Name: Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited
General.Description: Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited designs, develops, markets, and sells integrated circuits or microchips and other services. The company offers microchips for access and immobilizer systems, livestock identification tags, near field communications, and access control and interrogator or reader systems. Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

8.Name: Mr. Kan Opas Jamrasakit
8.Title: Sr. Mang. of Financial Strategy Planning Department & Company Sec.
